content: Keep in mind that HL7 ballot sign-up is open, for folks interested in commenting on the FHIR IG -- http://www.hl7.org/ctl.cfm?action=ballots.loginchoice is the entry point (and there are... some docs here, but the process isn't the most intuitive.)

Is there a specification created in jira for this IG? (Will there be?) e.g.
image.png

I believe the plan is for all fhir implementation guides to ballot through this jira process -- and even without balloting, there should be a Jira "specification" value assigned to the Vaccination and Testing IG

I'll work on getting that set up ...
We're also expecting to transfer the github repo for the IG to HL7 soon.
